April 7, 2019 D North American Championships (Championship Section)
North American Championships (Championship Section) 0 Set Test and Own Choice North American Championships north-american-bbc-championship-section
United States of America
Championship
Partita [Heaton]
Embassy Theatre, Fort Wayne, Indiana, USA Set piece Adjudicator(s): William Himes, Allan Ramsay, Stephen Bulla Own choice Adjudicator(s): Dr Keith Wilkinson, Allan Ramsay, Stephen Bulla
The overall score is weighted as 60% test piece, 40% remainder of program. First tiebreaker: The band with the highest test piece scores wins. Second tiebreaker: The band rated higher on the test piece by 2 of the 3 judges wins.
April 7, 2019, 12:54 p.m. Dec. 5, 2019, 1:30 p.m.

2 James Madison University Brass Band Kevin Stees Music of the Spheres
